'''1.7.10 Build 16<ref>{{Link|url=https://mcedudev.tumblr.com/post/115298245304/happy-easter|title=Happy Easter!|website=Tumblr|date=April 2, 2015}}</ref>''' is the sixteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on April 2, 2015. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
* Added French and Russian languages.

== Changes ==
* Updated forge to 1291
* New TG logo in splash screen.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Students being able to fly after respawn or teleporting.
* Signs sometimes displaying weird EQUALS strings.
